name: installation

.pull-left[
# Installing Git

### Windows and macOS

Download from <https://git-scm.com/>

Windows users may have to restart after installation to update the system PATH

### Linux

Install via package manager, e.g.

```sh
sudo apt install git
```
]

.pull-right[
# Installing a client

[Many options](https://git-scm.com/downloads/guis/), but to highlight a few:

♟ [**GitHub Desktop**](https://desktop.github.com/)

⤷ very simple client, only most basic features

♜ [**GitKraken**](https://www.gitkraken.com/)

⤷ more features, fancy UI; free for _non-commercial_ use, requires account

♞ **Your editor of choice**

⤷ many editors support version control from inside the editor

♛ **The command line** `r emo::ji('smirk')`
]
